name: @d2l/node-env-or
description: Interface for process.env variables that allows setting a default value if none is set

scripts.test: npm run check-style && npm run test-unit
scripts.test-unit: export NODE_ENV=test; istanbul cover --dir ./coverage/unit --root src/ node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --recursive ./test/unit || node_modules/.bin/mocha -R spec --recursive ./test/unit

author: D2L Corporation
